title: The Driftwood Tavern
summary: The party formed at the Driftwood Tavern in Neverwinter, met Gundren Rockseeker and Sildar Hallwinter, and began gathering supplies for their journey to Phandalin. Their first real test came in the form of a rat-infested storehouse.

best_moments.title: I Thought Elves Were Supposed to Be Smart
best_moments.description: The iconic exchange that would define Belden and Semaj's relationship.

quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.text: I thought you elves were supposed to be smart.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: I thought you dwarfs were supposed to be short.

best_moments.title: Medieval Uber
best_moments.description: Semaj's solution for transporting supplies showed his... creative thinking.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: I don't know if they have like medieval Uber or something like if you order it and they deliver it.

quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.text: I thought you elves were supposed to be smart.

best_moments.title: The Graceful Backflip
best_moments.description: When Belden jerked the wagon, Semaj nat 20'd his athletics check.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Both of you are able to kind of doâ€”you say you do a backflip off of the wagon here?

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: I do a backflip and land on my feet.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: And when I realized that they saw that happen, I immediately fall down and act like, oh, I almost landed that one.

best_moments.title: Toss a Coin to Your Barmaid
best_moments.description: Semaj tipped the barmaid who showed them to the stables.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: She catches it with ease as you flip her this coin. This is not the first time someone has just tossed a coin to your barmaid. She catches it, looks at it, puts it kind of in her bust and says, Why thank you.

best_moments.title: Kaelia's Protective Nature
best_moments.description: The flames flickered when Belden insulted Semaj one too many times.

quotes.speaker: Kaelia
quotes.text: As Belden says that the second time, Kaelia's eyes sort of light up and flicker a little bit, which is a tell that she's annoyed.

best_moments.title: Belden's Foot Gets Stuck
best_moments.description: The moment that would haunt Belden for sessions to come.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Belden, you demonstrated your strength on the front lines with your warhammer, though you struggled when you got your foot stuck in a crack.

combat_encounters.name: Rat Infestation at Patty's Storehouse
notable_events: Kaelia lit up the storehouse with fire magic
Belden's foot got stuck in the floorboards
Semaj used Magic Missile with precision
Kaelia extinguished the flames at the end

Semaj.one_liner: I don't know if they have like medieval Uber.

moments: Eyes flickered with fire when annoyed

Belden.one_liner: I thought you elves were supposed to be smart.

moments: Shoved bacon in his mouth before leaving
Watched in awe at Semaj's backflip

plot_developments: Met Gundren Rockseeker and Sildar Hallwinter at the Driftwood Tavern
Tasked with gathering supplies and transporting them to Phandalin
Picked up ale kegs from Brandy's Brewery (met Grogala the half-orc)
Cleared rat infestation at Patty's General Store
Received supplies for the journey to Phandalin

quotes_of_the_session.quote: I thought you elves were supposed to be smart.
quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Belden

quotes_of_the_session.quote: I thought you dwarfs were supposed to be short.
quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Semaj

quotes_of_the_session.quote: I do a backflip and land on my feet.
quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Semaj
quotes_of_the_session.context: Nat 20 athletics after being thrown from the wagon

quotes_of_the_session.quote: I won't do what you tell me!
quotes_of_the_session.speaker: GM (Alex)
quotes_of_the_session.context: Setting the Rage Against the Machine tone from the start

end_state.next_objective: Continue gathering supplies, then depart for Phandalin
